gobblin.source.extractor.extract.restapi

Class RestApiExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.source.extractor.extract.QueryBasedExtractor<com.google.gson.JsonArray,com.google.gson.JsonElement>
      • gobblin.source.extractor.extract.restapi.RestApiExtractor
  • Type Parameters:
    D - type of data record
    S - type of schema
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProtocolSpecificLayer<com.google.gson.JsonArray,com.google.gson.JsonElement>, RestApiSpecificLayer, SourceSpecificLayer<com.google.gson.JsonArray,com.google.gson.JsonElement>, gobblin.source.extractor.Extractor<com.google.gson.JsonArray,com.google.gson.JsonElement>, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public abstract class RestApiExtractor
extends QueryBasedExtractor<com.google.gson.JsonArray,com.google.gson.JsonElement>
implements SourceSpecificLayer<com.google.gson.JsonArray,com.google.gson.JsonElement>, RestApiSpecificLayer
    An implementation of rest api extractor for the sources that are using rest api
